BRIEF-Avcorp Announces Labour Action At British Columbia Facility

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 17, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Avcorp Announces Labour Action At British Columbia Facility Sept 17 (Reuters) - Avcorp Industries Inc : * AVCORP ANNOUNCES LABOUR ACTION AT DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA MANUFACTURING FACILITY * AVCORP - INITIATED LOCKOUT OF UNIONIZED EMPLOYEES AT ITS DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA FACILITY FOLLOWING A LOCKOUT NOTICE BEING PROVIDED ON SEPT 16, 2019 * AVCORP INDUSTRIES INC - LOCKOUT AFFECTS ABOUT 270 WORKERS IN DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA * AVCORP INDUSTRIES - CO'S OPERATIONS TO BE SUBSTANTIALLY REDUCED DURING LOCKOUT AT ITS DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA FACILITYAND IS OPERATING ON REDUCED BASIS

BRIEF-Avcorp Announces Labour Action At British Columbia Facility
